cn.wangdazhuang.zdict.util
类 FileAccessor

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      cn.wangdazhuang.zdict.util.FileAccessor
所有已实现的接口：
java.io.Closeable
public class FileAccessor
extends java.io.InputStream

This class extends InputStream, and delegate RandomAccessFile for some random access operations. So, this class can manipulate file with "high/low level" methods as Stream manipulatation. In other words, we can read(many methods for reading file) or write file byte by byte, or line by line.

版本：
1.1.3.6, Mar 2, 2008
作者：
88250
另请参见：
InputStream, RandomAccessFile

readLine

public java.lang.String readLine()
                          throws java.io.IOException
Reads a line of text. A line is considered to be terminated by any one of a line feed ('\n'), a carriage return ('\r'), or a carriage return followed immediately by a linefeed.

返回：
A String containing the contents of the line, not including any line-termination characters, or null if the end of the stream has been reached
抛出：
java.io.IOException
